q2: How far did Argentina make it in the 2018 world cup?
a2: They lost in the round of 16 to France.
q3: Why do Argentina struggle so much with such a great squad?
a3: Lionel Messi has a tough year, but the coach deserves more of the blame.
a4: Aguero and Dybala are also very good.
q5: What changes do you think they need to make?
a5: I think they need to strengthen their defense.
